惠特曼创造了诗歌的自由体（Free Verse），其里面个别单词也有自由发挥的余地，当年莎士比亚就独创了很多单词。2010-04-03 高 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French versé or Latin versatus, past participle of versari 'be engaged in'

entry.def: If you are versed in or well versed in something, you know a lot about it.

example.ex: Page is well versed in many styles of jazz.
example.tran: 佩奇精通多种风格的爵士乐。

example.ex: ...experts more versed in the economics of taxes than the politics of taxes.
example.tran: 对赋税的经济价值而非政治意义更为精通的专家们

means.word_mean: 1. thoroughly acquainted with and skilled in something through study or experience;

auth_sentence.content: He...was versed in all the divinity of the Greeks.
auth_sentence.res_content: He...was versed in all the divinity of the Greeks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...was versed in all the divinity of the Greeks.

auth_sentence.content: Torpedoes, a topic Henry was well versed in.
auth_sentence.res_content: Torpedoes, a topic Henry was well versed in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Torpedoes, a topic Henry was well versed in.

auth_sentence.content: The team was well versed in Western business practices.
auth_sentence.res_content: The team was well versed in Western business practices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The team was well versed in Western business practices.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的

vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐

diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能

vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化

sentences.en: He is well versed in history.
